attributes.action: Allow the people who live in Monmouthshire a referendum to determine whether they wish for their historic English county to be reunited with England or to remain in Wales.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Monmouthshire is an historic English county handed over to Wales by the Heath Conservative government in the early 1970s.  Let the people of Monmouthshire decide whether they wish to be part of England or Wales.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Allow the people who live in Monmouthshire a referendum to determine whether they wish for their historic English county to be reunited with England or to remain in Wales."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14193.asp

Prime Minister's Office
